name: backpacking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 the activity of travelling while carrying your clothes and other things that you need in a backpack, usually not spending very much money and staying in places that are not expensive: to go backpacking a backpacking trip/holiday Can America be cheap enough for backpacking?
mainly US the activity of walking from place to place in the countryside, carrying the things you need in a backpack and camping at night: I used to hike to photograph waterfalls, and that grew into a love of backpacking. Head out from Dog Canyon campground for an overnight backpacking trip down the Tejas Trail.
gaspr13/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
